House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01031
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A COMPREHENSIVE NUCLEAR REGULATION, CREATING FOR THE PURPOSE, THE PHILIPPINE NUCLEAR REGULATORY COMMISSION, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Aims to create a single, independent nuclear regulatory body for implementing effective measures to control, prevent, detect uses and application of nuclear energy and respond to unauthorized acts involving nuclear material, other radioactive sources or associated facilities that may cause injury to persons, property or the environment or jeopardize national security.
ALIAS NAME : “Comprehensive Nuclear Regulation Act of 2019.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALCEDA, JOEY SARTE
DATE FILED : 2019-07-02
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
